summary: Where are we humans going? A film poem inspired by the Peruvian poet César Vallejo. We meet people in the city. People trying to communicate, searching compassion and get the connection of small and large things.
cast: Lars Nordh|Stefan Larsson|Bengt C.W. Carlsson|Torbjörn Fahlström|Sten Andersson|Rolando Núñez|Lucio Vucina|Per Jörnelius|Peter Roth|Klas-Gösta Olsson|Nils-Åke Eriksson|Hanna Eriksson|Tommy Johansson|Sture Olsson|Fredrik Sjögren|Stephen Whitton|Jöran Mueller|Eva Stenfelt|Helene Mathiasson|Kristina Hukkala Ranch|Lasse Finberg|Tomas Johansson|Johan Bergenlöv|Tylar Gustavson|Birgitta-Irene Lundberg|Siv Wagenius|Birgitta Persson|Birgitta Hedberg|Inger Christell-Malmberg|Birgitta Gustafvsson|Jonny Tholwar|Ingela Persson|Jörgen Grundström|Orvar Lidsell|Hans Eriksson|Birger Hedlund|Peter Rudbeck|Hasse Söderholm|John Gustafsson|Stigh Holm|Barbro Herin|Ann Brit Nilsson|Marjatta Grahn|Jan Hallberg|Rune Falk|Jan Olsson|Jan Wikbladh|Lennart Ehrenlood|Åke Wärnling|Gun Fors|Conny Linnteg|Gunnar Ivarsson|Tanya Lylyoja|Ingegerd Norr|Erik Olsausson|Stig Lundström|Berndt Dabel|Karna Wachtmeister|Anders-Per Jonsson|Björn Frisk|Stig Hellsten|Anders Bröms|Björn Andreasson|Åke Westerberg|Sandy Mansson|Michal Moszkowicz|Filip Nyborg|Oskar Snickars|Tadeusz Urbanski
title: Canciones del segundo piso
